tool_description: The simplest way to remove image backgrounds through API
name: Background removal_v2
title: Background removal

api_list.name: Check Status
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to check if the server is up and running.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://background-removal13.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/checkStatus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "background-removal13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://background-removal13.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/checkStatus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
